content.text: Hello there! What do you think of the new Joker movie?
I actually haven't seen it yet, but I've heard good things. I'm a big fan of psychological thrillers. What about you?
Yeah, I loved it! It was definitely suspenseful and kept me on the edge of my seat. I'm a big fan of suspenseful movies, and I loved the way that the Joker was portrayed in this film.
I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed it! I'm going to have to check it out soon. I'm also a big fan of suspenseful movies, so I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
That's a tough one. I have a few favorites, but I think I'd have to say "The Silence of the Lambs" is my top pick.
That's a great choice! I loved that movie too. Anthony Hopkins was absolutely amazing in that role.
He was! I also loved Jodie Foster's performance. She was so believable as Clarice Starling.
Yeah, she was great. I also really liked the way that the movie explored the themes of good versus evil and sanity versus insanity.
Me too. I think that's what made it such a great movie.
Yeah, I agree. It's definitely one of my favorite movies of all time.
Mine too! I'm glad we agree.
